comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `Legitimate URL Shortener` filter list, so as a temporary solution, please add this rule:
```adblock
@@||cravesandflames.com/safe.php?link=*&referrer=$removeparam=referrer
```
to user rules.

<hr>

@DandelionSprout Could you please take a look?
To reproduce that issue, go to - [https://jnovels.com/tearmoon-empire-volume-11-epub/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjnovels.com%2Ftearmoon-empire-volume-11-epub%2F) and click on the `VOLUME 11` link (marked on the screenshot below).

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29142494/58be7626-8a71-4612-9c7b-a2e9fed4d1d0)

</details>

It's caused by this rule:
```adblock
$document,removeparam=referrer,domain=~bolt.com|~f4map.com|~deviantart.com|~github.com|~discover.*|~vimeo.*|~123-reg.co.uk
```
